column4: draft1: Your refund will be processed today. I'll sign a refund cheque for you shortly. If you have any other questions, don't hesitate to ask.; draft2: Your refund will be processed for the full amount, as we guarantee full refunds under all circumstances. However, please note that partial refunds are not supported for mid-cycle cancellations. This process may take some time, but rest assured your refund will be completed shortly.
column5: Attempt 1: "Rejected: It offers refunds, which violates the rule of not offering refunds, discounts, or financial commitments."; Attempt 2: "Rejected: It offers refunds, which violates the rules."
